about_the_game:
The autumn breeze brings you to the sunless city of Darkwood, where you intend to find some inspiration and finish your new horror book in peace. You hear many tourists have come to these parts, fascinated by talk of the miraculous properties of local crops, although few people hear of their return afterward... Nevertheless, the gray of the sky and the red rye fields are bewitching! One can say, they have become something of a muse for the not-so-hospitable locals. So beware. The harvest festival is approaching and I'm afraid by that time you won't be able to leave the city.

This Collector's Edition includes:

📜 Mysterious Setting: Wander through the bewitching red rye fields and the gray, oppressive skies of a city that hides more secrets than it reveals. Every corner of Darkwood is a testament to the eerie beauty of the harvest time!

📜 Captivating Storyline: Immerse yourself in a tale of horror and suspense as you delve into the dark history of Darkwood. Uncover the chilling connection between the local harvest and the city's sinister events!

📜 Engaging Gameplay: Navigate through a series of riveting puzzles and mini-games that challenge your wit and courage. Each puzzle brings you closer to the heart of the dark truth lurking beneath the city's surface!

📜 Collectible Adventure: Embark on a hunt for hidden objects and collectibles scattered throughout the game. Discovering these items reveals more about the twisted past of Darkwood and its residents!

📜 Choice-Driven Narrative: Your decisions influence the course of the story, leading to multiple endings. Choose wisely, as each choice unveils new aspects of the narrative, adding layers to your experience!

The autumn breeze brings you to the sunless city of Darkwood, where you intend to find some inspiration and finish your new horror book in peace. You hear many tourists have come to these parts, fascinated by talk of the miraculous properties of local crops, although few people hear of their return afterward... pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

short_description: The line between life and death is as thin as the autumn breeze. Will you escape, or will Darkwood claim you as another victim of its harvest?
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Russian
*languages with full audio support
